last_episode_to_air.name: Re-creation (The Final Day - Part 2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: Monarch's ultimate plan is now underway. Nothing seems to be able to stop him. Especially as, while the world is plunged into chaos, the super-villain has just trapped Ladybug himself.

name: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
original_name: Miraculous, les aventures de Ladybug et Chat Noir
overview: Marinette and Adrien, two Parisian teenagers, are entrusted with powerful jewels in order to transform into superheroes Ladybug and Cat Noir. But neither hero knows the other's true identity — or that they're classmates!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Two high-school students, Marinette and Adrien, are chosen to become Paris’ superheroes: Ladybug and Cat Noir. They each have a Miraculous, a jewel linked to their the magical creatures (Kwamis) that give them powers.Their mission is to keep Hawk Moth – who wants to steal their Miraculouses – from wreaking havoc on the town by creating increasingly dangerous supervillains – all while living their high school lives and keeping their identities secret. At school, Marinette has a crush on Adrien but cannot tell him, so she acts awkwardly whenever he’s around. As a superhero, Cat Noir loves Ladybug, but his ego annoys her: Marinette prefers Adrien anyway! Throughout the school year and their adventures, Ladybug discovers many nice qualities in Cat Noir while Marinette grows ever closer to Adrien, making huge efforts to overcome her shyness.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Marinette tries to find ways to get closer to Adrien, but Ladybug and Cat Noir have their hands full with the akumatizing havoc wreaked by Hawk Moth.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Marinette and Adrien's relationship finally takes a cautious step forward, but Kagami -- and the future of Paris -- stand in their way.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Not only is Marinette Ladybug, the superheroine that protects Paris from the attack of villains, but she’s also now the guardian of the Miraculous. This means that not only does she need to keep her identity hidden, but also the existence of these turbulent, magical creatures, the Kwamis! Marinette has a lot of pressure, not to mention her school and love life! Now she has less time and opportunities to tell Adrien her feelings... Marinette now has to redouble efforts to protect her secrets and Ladybug will have to become stronger to face an indomitable adversary: Shadow Moth, who can now fuse the Butterfly and Peacock Miraculous! Thankfully, Ladybug can count on Cat Noir and their new superhero allies!

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview:
Marinette has lost the miraculouses and the kwamis. She is only with her miraculous and Cat Noir with his. Shadow Moth has never been so close to victory. Now he can give his akumatized persons miraculous powers to create ultra-powerful supervillains.

But our heroes working together again in duo, will be more united than ever. This new trial will deeply mark their relationship and their private life. Nothing will be like before.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: Ladybug and Cat Noir must face a new enemy – mysterious, worrying, elusive, and yet close to them. Very close, but they have no idea. Marinette and Adrien too have never been so close to each other, but that does not necessarily make their everyday life a bed of roses, for they keep secrets from each other. The biggest secret being that they still do not know that they are Ladybug and Cat Noir. In a new and exemplary green Paris, in the heart of a new and revolutionary school, our heroes are about to experience a school year full of emotions and revelations.

episodes.name: Stormy Weather
episodes.overview: The loser of a kids-channel contest gets akumatized by Hawk Moth. Now Stormy Weather, she takes revenge on those who did not vote for her.  Dark skies await for our superheroes!

episodes.name: The Bubbler
episodes.overview: Adrien's best friend, Nino, is akumatized into the Bubbler, a villain who traps adults in bubbles and sends them floating away into the atmosphere.

episodes.name: The Pharaoh
episodes.overview: When a villain with the power of the ancient Egyptian gods wants to sacrifice Alya, Ladybug and Cat Noir must fight an army of mummies to rescue her.

episodes.name: Lady Wifi
episodes.overview: Mistakenly believing that Chloé is Ladybug, Alya gets expelled from school for her nosiness and becomes akumatized into the villain Lady Wifi.

episodes.name: Timebreaker
episodes.overview: When anger over a broken watch turns Alix into a time-traveling villain, it's up to Ladybug to return to the past and thwart her plans.

episodes.name: Mr. Pigeon
episodes.overview: The akuma fighters try to apprehend Mr. Pigeon, a bird lover who has kidnapped all the park keepers in Paris, but Cat Noir's allergies interfere.

episodes.name: The Evillustrator
episodes.overview: A fellow student with a crush on Marinette is akumatized into the Evillustrator, a villain that Cat Noir must face without Ladybug.

episodes.name: Rogercop
episodes.overview: When he's fired by the mayor, police officer Roger becomes Rogercop, a villain who thinks he's enforcing the law by ruling Paris as a dictator.

episodes.name: Copycat
episodes.overview: A jealous sculptor in love with Ladybug akumatizes into Copycat, a duplicate of Cat Noir who tries to take his rival's place by Ladybug's side.

episodes.name: Dark Cupid
episodes.overview: Marinette considers declaring her feelings to Adrien for Valentine's Day, but first they must stop Dark Cupid, a villain bent on eradicating love.

episodes.name: Horrificator
episodes.overview: During the filming of a short horror movie for Marinette's class, scared star Mylène is akumatized into a slimy monster that feeds on others' fears.

episodes.name: Darkblade
episodes.overview: While Marinette tries to retrieve her diary from Chloé, Adrien's fencing teacher is akumatized into Darkblade, a villain who storms city hall.

episodes.name: The Mime
episodes.overview: When Mylène's father loses a part in a play to his scheming understudy, he akumatizes into the Mime, a villain whose pantomimes become real.

episodes.name: Kung Food
episodes.overview: When his dish at a competition is sabotaged, Marinette's great-uncle chef Wang Cheng becomes Kung Food, who recruits henchmen with his cooking.

episodes.name: Gamer
episodes.overview: Marinette beats Adrien's video game tournament partner, Max, so she can replace him and spend time with her crush, but Max akumatizes into a villain.

episodes.name: Animan
episodes.overview: A humiliated zookeeper is akumatized into a villainous shapeshifting animal on a day when Marinette, Adrien and friends are visiting the zoo in Paris.

episodes.name: Antibug
episodes.overview: Crestfallen when her hero Ladybug refuses to heed her advice, Chloé akumatizes into Antibug, an evil twin of Ladybug with identical powers.

episodes.name: The Puppeteer
episodes.overview: Marinette babysits little Manon, who becomes akumatized into the Puppeteer while playing with dolls of Ladybug, Cat Noir and some infamous villains.

episodes.name: Reflekta
episodes.overview: Excluded from a class photo, dejected Juleka akumatizes into the villain Reflekta, who turns everyone, including Cat Noir, into copies of herself.

episodes.name: Guitar Villain
episodes.overview: Rock star Jagged Stone is akumatized into a supervillain who tries to transform all Parisians into fans and undermine his musical rival, Mr. XY.

episodes.name: Pixelator
episodes.overview: Rejected by a rock star, an angry fan becomes Pixelator, who traps Parisians in his camera's memory until Cat Noir and Ladybug halt his photo spree.

episodes.name: Princess Fragrance
episodes.overview: Marinette can't transform into Ladybug when classmate Rose is akumatized into a villain whose perfume lets her control Cat Noir and a visiting prince.

episodes.name: Simon Says
episodes.overview: A hypnotist akumatizes into Simon Says, a villain who can make anyone obey him with his deck of cards, and seeks revenge on Adrien's father.

episodes.name: Volpina
episodes.overview: Humiliated in front of Adrien by Marinette, Lila -- a rival who pretends to be Ladybug's friend -- akumatizes into Volpina, a villain of illusions.

episodes.name: Ladybug & Cat Noir - Origins, Part 1
episodes.overview: In a flashback, Ladybug and Cat Noir's origins are revealed, as Marinette befriends Alya and meets Adrien, a famous model with an overprotective dad.

episodes.name: Stoneheart - Origins, Part 2
episodes.overview: In a continuing flashback to Ladybug and Cat Noir's origins, Marinette mistakes Adrien for a bully and hesitates to embrace her Ladybug persona.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Two high-school students, Marinette and Adrien, are chosen to become Paris’ superheroes: Ladybug and Cat Noir. They each have a Miraculous, a jewel linked to their the magical creatures (Kwamis) that give them powers.Their mission is to keep Hawk Moth – who wants to steal their Miraculouses – from wreaking havoc on the town by creating increasingly dangerous supervillains – all while living their high school lives and keeping their identities secret. At school, Marinette has a crush on Adrien but cannot tell him, so she acts awkwardly whenever he’s around. As a superhero, Cat Noir loves Ladybug, but his ego annoys her: Marinette prefers Adrien anyway! Throughout the school year and their adventures, Ladybug discovers many nice qualities in Cat Noir while Marinette grows ever closer to Adrien, making huge efforts to overcome her shyness.

episodes.name: The Collector
episodes.overview: Master Fu and Marinette believe that the owner of the Miraculous book is Hawk Moth, but that suspicion leads to either Adrien or his father, Gabriel.

episodes.name: Despair Bear
episodes.overview: Trying to learn how to be nice, Chloé throws a party but loses her temper and fires her butler, who becomes akumatized into the vengeful Despair Bear.

episodes.name: Prime Queen
episodes.overview: During an exclusive interview, a reporter trying to trap Ladybug and Cat Noir into confessing feelings for each other is akumatized by Hawk Moth.

episodes.name: Befana
episodes.overview: When Marinette elects to hang out with her friends on her birthday instead of her grandmother, grandma is akumatized into a candy-gun-wielding baddie.

episodes.name: Riposte
episodes.overview: A fencing opponent who loses a duel against Adrien gets akumatized and goes after him for a rematch while only Ladybug is around to protect him.

episodes.name: Robostus
episodes.overview: Hawk Moth akumatizes Max's best friend and pet robot, Markov, into Robostus, a raging techno-threat with the power to bring inanimate objects to life.

episodes.name: Gigantitan
episodes.overview: Marinette's plans to ask Adrien out on a romantic walk are foiled when Hawk Moth akumatizes a frustrated child into a giant, lollipop-seeking baby.

episodes.name: The Dark Owl
episodes.overview: After school principal Damocles is akumatized into Dark Owl, he traps Ladybug and Cat Noir in a warehouse and tries to uncover their true identities.

episodes.name: Glaciator
episodes.overview: Marinette meets Alya and friends for a treat at André's, a legendary Parisian ice cream maker, but André is akumatized into the villain Glaciator.

episodes.name: Sapotis
episodes.overview: During a sleepover with Marinette, Alya punishes her twin sisters, Etta and Ella, who get akumatized into monsters that multiply when they eat.

episodes.name: Gorizilla
episodes.overview: Marinette must rescue Adrien from a group of overzealous fans and from his own bodyguard, who has been akumatized into the hulking Gorizilla.

episodes.name: Captain Hardrock
episodes.overview: Hawk Moth akumatizes Juleka's mother into Captain Hardrock, a pirate whose indestructible ship blasts loud music to destroy a music festival.

episodes.name: Zombizou
episodes.overview: The students give gifts to Miss Bustier on her birthday but the popular teacher is akumatized into Zombizou, a monster armed with evil black lipstick.

episodes.name: Syren
episodes.overview: When her crush, Kim, goes on a movie date with someone else, talented swimmer Ondine gets akumatized into Syren, who tries to submerge Paris.

episodes.name: Frightningale
episodes.overview: Marinette is cast to play Ladybug and Adrien as Cat Noir for a music video honoring the heroes, but the star gets akumatized into a musical monster.

episodes.name: Troublemaker
episodes.overview: A rock star is scheduled to visit the bakery owned by Marinette's parents, but his overwhelmed personal assistant is akumatized by Hawk Moth.

episodes.name: Anansi
episodes.overview: Alya's older sister Nora becomes akumatized by Hawk Moth into Anansi, an enormous spider-woman hybrid named after an African folktale.

episodes.name: Sandboy
episodes.overview: The supervillain Sandboy uses his powers to turn the nightmares of Parisians into reality, forcing a Tikki-less Marinette to intervene.

episodes.name: Reverser
episodes.overview: Angry over his perception that Marinette and Nathaniel humiliated him, fellow student Marc becomes Reverser, who is determined to get revenge.

episodes.name: Frozer
episodes.overview: A figure skater gets akumatized by Hawk Moth into Frozer, a villain armed with powerful skates who tries to turn Paris into a frozen wasteland.

episodes.name: Style Queen: The Queen's Battle (1)
episodes.overview: When she is humiliated by Gabriel, Chloe's mother becomes Style Queen, who possesses a magical scepter and aims to exact her revenge on Adrien.

episodes.name: Queen Wasp: The Queen's Battle (2)
episodes.overview: In an attempt to impress her mother, Chloe tries to become the superhero Queen Bee but is instead transformed into the supervillain Queen Wasp.

episodes.name: Malediktator
episodes.overview: When Chloe considers leaving Paris, her father, Mayor Bourgeois, turns into Malediktator, a powerful villain who wants her to stay at any cost.

episodes.name: Catalyst: Heroes' Day (1)
episodes.overview: Marinette lies about preparing a good deed to perform for others on the Day of Heroes and quickly finds her untruth spinning out of control.

episodes.name: Mayura: Heroes' Day (2)
episodes.overview: Ladybug and Cat Noir face one of their most fearsome opponents when Hawk Moth sets a sinister plan into motion by akumatizing his assistant.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Marinette tries to find ways to get closer to Adrien, but Ladybug and Cat Noir have their hands full with the akumatizing havoc wreaked by Hawk Moth.

episodes.name: Backwarder
episodes.overview: After Marinette mixes up some messages, an old love of Master Fu becomes Backwarder, who wields a magic wand that can steal time from others.

episodes.name: Weredad
episodes.overview: Disappointed that Cat Noir doesn't return his daughter's love, Tom becomes Weredad, who locks Marinette in a magic prison to protect her from hurt.

episodes.name: Chameleon
episodes.overview: Marinette and Adrien confront Lila with her lies, so she asks Hawk Moth to akumatize her into Chameleon, a new villain determined to destroy Ladybug.

episodes.name: Animaestro
episodes.overview: Humiliated at the premiere of his new Ladybug and Cat Noir movie, the director becomes Animaestro, forcing the real superheroes to act fast.

episodes.name: Bakerix
episodes.overview: Marinette meets her grumpy grandpa for the first time, leading him to akumatize into a villain who wants to destroy everything modern in Paris.

episodes.name: Silencer
episodes.overview: Marinette and Kitty Section record a music video, but an unscrupulous producer, the father of XY, steals their ideas and inspires Luka to seek revenge.

episodes.name: Oblivio
episodes.overview: When they enter the Montparnasse Tower, Ladybug and Cat Noir lose their memories and transform back into Marinette and Adrien in front of each other.

episodes.name: Stormy Weather 2
episodes.overview: Ladybug and Cat Noir must fight Aurore Boreale when she is akumatized again into Stormy Weather 2, who wants to plunge the world into endless winter.

episodes.name: Reflekdoll
episodes.overview: Ladybug and Cat Noir each get the other's Miraculous when they must take on Juleka, who has become Reflekta again and now has a sentimonster.

episodes.name: Oni-Chan
episodes.overview: Kagami becomes jealous when Lila manipulates her way into the Agreste mansion and turns into Oni-Chan, a masked villain who can teleport.

episodes.name: Miraculer
episodes.overview: Sabrina, angry at Chloe for the attention she gives to Ladybug, becomes Miraculer, who can steal powers away from superheroes.

episodes.name: The Puppeteer 2
episodes.overview: Marinette tries to arrange some alone time with Adrien at the wax museum, but she's supposed to be babysitting Manon, who becomes Puppeteer again.

episodes.name: Desperada
episodes.overview: Jagged Stone seeks to replace the guitarist he fired, who akumatizes into Desperada, a villain with a magic guitar that turns people into stickers.

episodes.name: Startrain
episodes.overview: Anxiously awaiting news about her astronaut application, Max's mom becomes Startrain, who wants to turn her train into a rocket ship.

episodes.name: Kwamibuster
episodes.overview: Mrs. Mendeleiev discovers Plagg and Tikki and plans to reveal the existence of the kwamis on a TV show until she is akumatized into Kwami Buster.

episodes.name: Feast
episodes.overview: A strange statue uncovered in Tibet turns out to be a sentimonster called Feast that was created accidentally by Master Fu when he was a child.

episodes.name: Ikari Gozen
episodes.overview: Adrien is the prize in a Paris-wide Friendship Day treasure hunt, but Marinette is teamed up with Kagami, who has disobeyed her mother to participate.

episodes.name: Timetagger
episodes.overview: Ladybug and Cat Noir are trapped between two time travelers from the future, one of whom has been sent by Hawk Moth to steal their Miraculous.

episodes.name: Party Crasher
episodes.overview: After Adrien tells his friend Wayem he's not allowed to have friends over, Wayem discovers an impromptu party at the Agrestes that makes him jealous.

episodes.name: Gamer 2.0
episodes.overview: When he can't find anyone to test his video game that pits formerly akumatized villains against one another, Max again becomes one himself: Gamer 2.0.

episodes.name: Cat Blanc
episodes.overview: Marinette uses her powers to leave a gift for Adrien, causing him to realize her secret identity -- which has a devastating impact on the future.

episodes.name: Félix
episodes.overview: Marinette reveals her feelings for Adrien on the anniversary of his mom's death, but his lookalike cousin pretends to be Adrien and responds cruelly.

episodes.name: Ladybug
episodes.overview: Marinette's scheming nemesis Lila manipulates all of her friends into turning against her and even gets Marinette expelled from school.

episodes.name: Chris Master
episodes.overview: Marinette babysits Nino's little brother, Chris, who akumatizes into Chris Master and wields a magic snow globe that can make giant toys.

episodes.name: Heart Hunter (The Battle of the Miraculous – Part 1)
episodes.overview: At a celebration for their twentieth anniversary, the Bourgeois couple is akumatized into Hearthunter, a two-headed Cerberus that devours love.

episodes.name: Miracle Queen (The Battle of the Miraculous – Part 2)
episodes.overview: Hawk Moth changes Chloe into Miracle Queen and conquers Paris, forcing Miraculous wearers to reveal themselves -- but Ladybug and Cat Noir escape.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Marinette and Adrien's relationship finally takes a cautious step forward, but Kagami -- and the future of Paris -- stand in their way.

episodes.name: Truth
episodes.overview: A friend of Marinette's gets akumatized into Truth. Using his power to force people to tell the truth, he wants to know Marinette's secret.

episodes.name: Lies
episodes.overview: A friend of Adrien's gets akumatized into Lies and becomes determined to rid the world of lies and those who tell them.

episodes.name: Gang of Secrets
episodes.overview: Marinette's friends get akumatized into the Gang of Secrets, a team of supervillains determined to save her.

episodes.name: Mr. Pigeon 72
episodes.overview: Mr. Ramier gets akumatized into Mr. Pigeon for the 72nd time, and now he can turn people into evil pigeons.

episodes.name: Furious Fu
episodes.overview: Ladybug and Cat Noir face someone they know well, and never imagined they would have to fight someday.

episodes.name: Sole Crusher
episodes.overview: A newcomer to Marinette's circle of friends gets akumatized into Sole Crusher, a humongous supervillain who can absorb people.

episodes.name: Queen Banana
episodes.overview: Chloe is akumatized into Queen Banana and Ladybug decides to entrust a Miraculous to help her stop a supervillain.

episodes.name: Guiltrip
episodes.overview: When Reflekta becomes entangled in a bottomless abyss of guilt, Ladybug calls an ally for help with unshakable optimism.

episodes.name: Crocoduel
episodes.overview: Because of a plan thought up by Marinette, Shadow Moth akumatizes two villains. Ladybug and Cat Noir will need help to stop the evil duo.

episodes.name: Optigami
episodes.overview: What would happen if Shadow Moth created a fearsome supervillain while Marinette and Adrien couldn't transform into Ladybug and Cat Noir?

episodes.name: Sentibubbler
episodes.overview: Shadow Moth creates Sentibubbler, a fearsome sentimonster that will only stop if Rena Rouge betrays Ladybug and Cat Noir!

episodes.name: Rocketear
episodes.overview: As Guardian of Miraculous, Ladybug must make difficult decisions which affect the people around her. But not everyone is ready to live in permanent hiding like her...

episodes.name: Mega Leech
episodes.overview: When Malediktator comes back, now seconded by a Sentimonster, Ladybug entrusts a committed friend and ally with a Miraculous to help her save Paris.

episodes.name: Wishmaker
episodes.overview: As Marinette thinks about her future, a supervillain shows up in Paris. Able to force people to live their childhood dreams, he turns into a nightmare for our heroes.

episodes.name: Hack-San
episodes.overview: When Marinette needs to leave Paris for a day for her aunt's birthday in London, the fear of something happening in Ladybug's absence makes her super nervous. Shadow Moth manages to infect Max's robot with an evil virus to akumatize it again. What will happen?

episodes.name: Simpleman
episodes.overview: Adrien asks Marinette a favor, who can't say no and ends up leaving her grandfather taking care of the 4 children she was taking care of to help Adrien. What she doesn't realize is that it ends up making her grandfather the Shadow Moth's next target.

episodes.name: Glaciator 2
episodes.overview: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Glaciator again. Glaciator annoys Ladybug by insisting that the superheroes are in love. Cat Noir encounters Marinette, who wrestles with secret romance.

episodes.name: Dearest Family
episodes.overview: Galette Day is eventful for Marinette! Tikki is acting very strange and three supervillains show up! Will Ladybug still manage to establish herself as queen of the day?

episodes.name: Ephemeral
episodes.overview: Ladybug decides whether she should reveal Cat Noir's identity so that she can remain the Guardian.

episodes.name: Gabriel Agreste
episodes.overview: Marinette sneaks into the Agreste home during a private dinner, only to find that a supervillain is also crashing the party.

episodes.name: Psycomedian
episodes.overview: A famous comedian gets akumatized into Psycomedian; able to impose any emotions on anyone, he wants to wipe the smiles off everyone's faces starting with Ladybug and Cat Noir.

episodes.name: Kuro Neko
episodes.overview: Ladybug manages to assemble an amazing team of superheroes now that she is Guardian of the Miraculous, but Cat Noir is feeling left out and decides to give up his Miraculous. Ladybug now needs to deliver the Cat Miraculous to someone else.

episodes.name: Penalteam
episodes.overview: When one of Shadow Moth's favorite victims is akumatized into Penalteam, a fearsome team of supervillains, Ladybug calls on her own superhero team in order to face her; may the best team win.

episodes.name: Qilin
episodes.overview: Because one of Marinette's careless mistakes, one of her closet relatives is akumatized into Qilin, a fearsome supervillain.

episodes.name: Risk (Shadow Moth's Final Attack - Part 1)
episodes.overview: Without Ladybug and Cat Noir knowing, Shadow Moth patiently sets his final attack in motion...

episodes.name: Strikeback (Shadow Moth's Final Attack - Part 2)
episodes.overview: Shadow Moth's trap closes in on Ladybug and Cat Noir, threatening to turn their fate upside down forever...

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Not only is Marinette Ladybug, the superheroine that protects Paris from the attack of villains, but she’s also now the guardian of the Miraculous. This means that not only does she need to keep her identity hidden, but also the existence of these turbulent, magical creatures, the Kwamis! Marinette has a lot of pressure, not to mention her school and love life! Now she has less time and opportunities to tell Adrien her feelings... Marinette now has to redouble efforts to protect her secrets and Ladybug will have to become stronger to face an indomitable adversary: Shadow Moth, who can now fuse the Butterfly and Peacock Miraculous! Thankfully, Ladybug can count on Cat Noir and their new superhero allies!

episodes.name: Evolution
episodes.overview: After having access to almost all the Miraculouses, Hawk Moth turns into Monarch and uses the Rabbit Miraculous to return to a vulnerable moment in Ladybug and Cat Noir's past to capture their Miraculous.

episodes.name: Multiplication
episodes.overview: As the days go by, not a single akumatized villain shows up to torment Paris. Could Monarch possibly have given up?

episodes.name: Destruction
episodes.overview: What if Ladybug's worst nightmare came true? What if Monarch showed up at Marinette Dupain-Cheng's home... would she be able to escape him?

episodes.name: Jubilation
episodes.overview: Monarch entrusts an akumatized villain with the power of Jubilation, which shows people their deepest desires. Will Ladybug and Cat Noir escape that dangerous power?

episodes.name: Determination
episodes.overview: While Marinette and Adrien wonder about their feelings, Ladybug and Cat Noir face a villain... and her 17 goons!

episodes.name: Passion
episodes.overview: As everything turns upside down in their love lives, Ladybug and Cat Noir must exchange their Miraculous to escape a ruthless villain.

episodes.name: Reunion
episodes.overview: While visiting the Louvre museum, Marinette discovers the secrets of the kwagatama that Tikki gave her on her birthday.

episodes.name: Illusion
episodes.overview: A secret network at school is determined to find out how Monarch's new power works by deliberately triggering an akumatization. Would Ladybug and Cat Noir agree with such a plan?

episodes.name: Elation
episodes.overview: As Ladybug and Cat Noir face Glaciator again, our heroes don’t know that they are about to make a chilling discovery!

episodes.name: Transmission (The Kwamis' Choice - Part 1)
episodes.overview: Tikki and Plagg are sad to see their carriers so sad to be forced to give up their feelings. The Kwamis will then make a radical choice that will change many things in Paris.

episodes.name: Deflagration (The Kwamis' Choice - Part 2)
episodes.overview: Monarch is faced with a unique opportunity that he refuses to miss. The world is about to be reconfigured, and no one seems able to prevent it, for the Kwamis have made a choice that completely freed Marinette and Adrien from their responsibilities. For better… and for worse.

episodes.name: Perfection
episodes.overview: The whole class has decided to do everything to help Marinette finally get closer to Adrien, but what they don't know is that she also has come up with a unique plan to try and tell Adrien how she feels.

episodes.name: Migration
episodes.overview: As the son of a celebrity, Luka piques special interest in Bob Roth, who would do anything to make money! But Luka himself would do anything to defend his values and his friends.

episodes.name: Derision
episodes.overview: Marinette is about to have a normal date with Adrien, but she starts to suffer repeated panic attacks creating an emotional situation that can make her a target for Monarch.

episodes.name: Intuition
episodes.overview: Monarch senses a unique occasion to get a real second chance. He is ready to do anything, even if it means that this could be his last chance to seize the Miraculous.

episodes.name: Protection
episodes.overview: While the gang concocts yet another elaborate plan to reunite Marinette and Adrien, Lila uses her talents for manipulation to persuade Kagami that Marinette is a liar.

episodes.name: Adoration
episodes.overview: Marinette learns that Zoé is secretly in love with someone in ninth grade at school. Zoé says that she cannot talk about it. To Marinette, this can only mean one thing: Zoé is in love with Adrien!

episodes.name: Emotion
episodes.overview: Adrien must attend the Diamonds’ Dance organized by his father and Mrs. Tsurugi. When she finds out that Adrien did not dare to tell her about the dance, Marinette decides to go too.

episodes.name: Pretension
episodes.overview: Marinette decides to have a frank talk with Gabriel Agreste about her love for Adrien, and her courage inspires her friend Kagami as she tries to open up to her mother.

episodes.name: Revelation
episodes.overview: Marinette and Adrien’s closeness pushes the boy’s father to make Kagami the face of the brand, which infuriates Lila. She uses the class accident to call for a new election so that she can replace Marinette as class representative.

episodes.name: Confrontation
episodes.overview: The end of secondary school is approaching and Lila & Chloé have to defend their classmates futures in front of the class council. Marinette is worried. What will be the next evil plan of the 2 villains?

episodes.name: Collusion
episodes.overview: The end of the school year is approaching and the rebellion is growing. Monarch decides to implement a dangerous plan for his secret identity, but also very precarious for Ladybug and Cat Noir.

episodes.name: Revolution
episodes.overview: Chloé is more powerful than ever and, thanks to her, so is Monarch. Ladybug and Cat Noir wonder about their superpowers, unaware that they have just fallen into a machiavellian trap. As for Marinette and Adrien, their lives are about to change forever.

episodes.name: Representation
episodes.overview: When Adrien disobeys his father to join Marinette, the latter is forced to find his son. At the same time, Marinette is convinced that Adrien is looking for her. Thinking she will find the boy she loves, she discovers a secret that nothing prepared her for.

episodes.name: Conformation (The Final Day - Part 1)
episodes.overview: Monarch has just placed the final pieces of his machiavellian plan on his chessboard of evil. Are Ladybug and Chat Noir doomed?

episodes.name: Re-creation (The Final Day - Part 2)
episodes.overview: Monarch's ultimate plan is now underway. Nothing seems to be able to stop him. Especially as, while the world is plunged into chaos, the super-villain has just trapped Ladybug himself.

5.name: Season 5
5.overview:
Marinette has lost the miraculouses and the kwamis. She is only with her miraculous and Cat Noir with his. Shadow Moth has never been so close to victory. Now he can give his akumatized persons miraculous powers to create ultra-powerful supervillains.

But our heroes working together again in duo, will be more united than ever. This new trial will deeply mark their relationship and their private life. Nothing will be like before.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: Ladybug and Cat Noir must face a new enemy – mysterious, worrying, elusive, and yet close to them. Very close, but they have no idea. Marinette and Adrien too have never been so close to each other, but that does not necessarily make their everyday life a bed of roses, for they keep secrets from each other. The biggest secret being that they still do not know that they are Ladybug and Cat Noir. In a new and exemplary green Paris, in the heart of a new and revolutionary school, our heroes are about to experience a school year full of emotions and revelations.
